= Source checkout =

If you are new to Git please follow the [http://help.github.com/set-up-git-redirect Set Up Git] guide first.

Feel free to [http://help.github.com/fork-a-repo/ fork our repository] and later send a [http://help.github.com/pull-requests/ pull request] so we can review your code and commit it into the official WebGL Earth code base. We are looking forward to your contribution!

== Direct download ==

The latest version of the WebGL Earth project is always available packed in an archive via GitHub:

 * [https://github.com/webglearth/webglearth/zipball/master webglearth.zip]
 * [https://github.com/webglearth/webglearth/tarball/master webglearth.tar.gz]

== GIT access ==

If you just want to get the source code, then use this command:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/webglearth/webglearth.git
}}}

== SVN access ==

Access to the code via SVN is possible via the [https://github.com/webglearth/webglearth GitHub] SVN gateway, so you can use the editors with support for SVN:
{{{
svn checkout https://svn.github.com/webglearth/webglearth
}}}
